TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebMessageEncodingBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension
Public NotInheritable Class WebMessageEncodingBindingElement Inherits MessageEncodingBindingElement Implements IWsdlExportExtension

summary.span: 允许在 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 绑定中使用纯文本 XML、JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 消息编码和“原始”二进制内容时对其进行读写。

span.span: Enables plain-text XML, JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) message encodings and "raw" binary content to be read and written when used in a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编码是将消息转换为一个字节序列的过程。Encoding is the process of transforming a message into a sequence of bytes. 解码是反向过程。Decoding is the reverse process. 这些过程都需要字符编码规范。These processes require the specification of a character encoding. 的工作方式是委托一系列内部编码器对纯文本 XML 与 JSON 编码以及“原始”二进制数据进行处理。The works by delegating to a series of inner encoders to handle the plain-text XML and JSON encodings, and "raw" binary data. 委托由复合消息编码器来完成。This delegation is done by a composite message encoder. 在不使用 SOAP 消息（由 使用）的方案中，用该绑定元素及其复合编码器控制编码。This binding element and its composite encoder are used to control the encoding in scenarios that do not use SOAP messaging used by the . 这些方案包括“纯旧式 XML”(POX)、具象状态传输 (REST)、真正简单的整合 (RSS) 与 Atom 整合以及异步 JavaScript 和 XML (AJAX)。These scenarios include "Plain Old XML" (POX), Representational State Transfer (REST), Really Simple Syndication (RSS) and Atom syndication, and Asynchronous JavaScript and XML (AJAX). 复合消息编码器不支持 SOAP 或 WS-Addressing，因此， 总是返回 。The composite message encoder does not support SOAP or WS-Addressing, and so always returns . 在使用 构造函数进行构造时可以使用编写字符编码配置绑定元素。The binding element can be configured with a write character encoding at construction time using the constructor. 值指定 JSON 与文本 XML 情况的编写行为。The value specifies the behavior on write for the JSON and Textual XML cases. 在读取时，将理解任何有效的消息编码与文本编码。On read, any valid message encoding and text encoding is understood. 此构造函数对分配给池的读取器和编写器的最大数量设置默认值，这两个默认值在未分配新的读取器和编写器时分别可用于处理传入和传出消息。This constructor sets default values on the maximum number of readers and writers that are allocated to pools and that are respectively available to process incoming and outgoing messages without allocating new readers or writers. 属性 与 也可以分别用来设置要分配的读取器和编写器最大数目。The properties and can also be used to set the maximum number of readers and writers to be allocated respectively. 默认情况下，将分配 64 个读取器和 16 个编写器。By default 64 readers and 16 writers are allocated. 此构造函数还可以通过 属性设置对与此编码关联的 的默认复杂性约束，以抵御某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。Default complexity constraints are also set by this constructor on the associated with this encoding by the property to protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 含有可以创建消息编码器工厂的 方法，该消息编码器工厂会根据指定的内容类型按需生成 JSON、XML 或原始消息解码器与编码器。The has a method that creates a message encoder factory that produces JSON, XML or Raw message decoders and encoders as appropriate depending on the content type specified. 还可以提供针对 HTTP 请求流过的通道生成工厂与侦听器的方法。The also provides the methods to build the factories and listeners for the channels through which the HTTP requests flow. 复合编码器及其关联的类和配置组件在部分信任中可用，这种使用无需任何特殊权限。The composite encoder and its associated classes and configuration components are usable in partial trust and this use does not require any special permissions.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将 用作默认字符编码。This constructor uses as the default character encoding. 因此，如果要使用该字符编码，可以使用这个构造函数。So use this constructor when you want this character encoding. 如果要使用其他字符编码，可以使用 构造函数。If you want another character encoding, use the constructor. 此构造函数对分配给池的读取器和编写器的最大数量设置默认值，这两个默认值在未分配新的读取器和编写器时分别可用于处理传入和传出消息。This constructor sets default values on the maximum number of readers and writers that are allocated to pools and that are respectively available to process incoming and outgoing messages without allocating new readers or writers. 在默认情况下分配给 属性的读取器个数为 64；在默认情况下分配给 属性的编写器个数为 16。There are 64 readers allocated by default for the property and there are 16 writers allocated by default for the property. 默认复杂性约束也由该构造函数在通过 属性与该消息编码关联的 上进行设置，以防止某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。Default complexity constraints are also set by this constructor on the associated with this message encoding by the property to protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表示这些约束的属性及其默认值（以字节表示）如下所示：The properties that express these constraints and their default values (in bytes) are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Text.Encoding writeEncoding) cil managed

param.name: writeEncoding
param.span: 用于在消息中写入字符的 。

summary.span: 使用指定的编写字符编码初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified write character encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持 UTF-8、Unicode 与 Big-Endian Unicode 消息文本编码。The message text encodings supported are UTF-8, Unicode, and Big-Endian Unicode. 如果指定其他文本编码，则会引发 。If another text encoding is specified, an is thrown. 此构造函数对分配给池的读取器和编写器的最大数量设置默认值，这两个默认值在未分配新的读取器和编写器时分别可用于处理传入和传出消息。This constructor sets default values on the maximum number of readers and writers that are allocated to pools and that are respectively available to process incoming and outgoing messages without allocating new readers or writers. 在默认情况下分配给 属性的读取器个数为 64；在默认情况下分配给 属性的编写器个数为 16。There are 64 readers allocated by default for the property and there are 16 writers allocated by default for the property. 默认复杂性约束也由该构造函数在通过 属性与该消息编码关联的 上进行设置，以防止某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。Default complexity constraints are also set by this constructor on the associated with this message encoding by the property to protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表示这些约束的属性及其默认值（以字节表示）如下所示：The properties that express these constraints and their default values (in bytes) are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384

span.span: is .

exception.span: 不支持 消息文本编码。

span.span: is not a supported message text encoding.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement Clone() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Clone () As BindingElement

summary.span: 创建一个从当前对象初始化的新 对象。

span.span: Creates a new object initialized from the current one.

returns.span: 一个 对象，其属性值等于当前元素的属性值。

span.span: A object with property values equal to those of the current element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这将创建当前绑定元素对象树的完整副本，也称为深层克隆。This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone. 对象的深层克隆创建对象的副本以及该对象直接或间接引用的所有内容的副本。A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. 这称为复制整个对象图。This is called copying the entire object graph. 通过返回深层克隆，运行时将能够支持多个自定义绑定共用一个自定义绑定元素的情况。Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element. 如果未返回深层克隆，则运行时行为将不可确定。If a deep clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined. 相比之下，对象的浅表克隆只是对象本身的副本。A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，则浅表复制不创建所引用对象的副本，而是仅复制对原始对象的引用。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Channels::WebContentTypeMapper ^ ContentTypeMapper { System::ServiceModel::Channels::WebContentTypeMapper ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Channels::WebContentTypeMapper ^ value); };

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory CreateMessageEncoderFactory() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateMessageEncoderFactory () As MessageEncoderFactory

summary.span: 创建可以生成消息编码器的消息编码器工厂，所生成的消息编码器可以编写 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 与 XML 消息。

span.span: Creates a message encoder factory that produces message encoders that can write either JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) or XML messages.

returns.span: 对 JSON、XML 或“原始”二进制消息进行编码的 。

span.span: The that encodes JSON, XML or "raw" binary messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值确定用于编写消息的字符编码。The value of the property determines the character encoding used to write the message. 与 属性可以指定分配给池的读取器和编写器的最大数量，这两个值在未分配新的读取器和编写器时可分别用于处理传入和传出消息。The maximum number of readers and writers that are allocated to pools and that is respectively available to process incoming and outgoing messages without allocating new readers are specified by the and properties. 用于由 生成的消息编码器的默认复杂性约束可以从通过 属性与该编码关联的 中获取，以防止某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。The default complexity constraints that are used by the message encoders produced by the can be obtained from the associated with this encoding by the property to protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此次重写向基 实现中添加了一个属性：如果 `T` 为 ，则返回 属性。This override adds one property to the base implementation: when `T` is , the property is returned.

span.span: set is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxReadPoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定无需分配新的读取器便可处理传入消息的最大读取器数，该数值将分配到池中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of readers that is allocated to a pool and that is available to process incoming messages without allocating new readers.

value.span: 用于处理传入消息的最大读取器数。

span.span: The maximum number of readers available to process incoming messages.

value.span: 默认值为 64 个各个类型的读取器。

span.span: The default value is 64 readers of each type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增大此数字将会增加内存消耗，但能够让编码器处理传入消息的突现高峰，因为编码器可以使用池中已创建的读取器，而不必创建新的读取器。Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of incoming messages because it is able to use readers from the pool that are already created instead of creating new ones.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxWritePoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定无需分配新的编写器便可处理传出消息的最大编写器数，该数值将分配到池中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of writers that is allocated to a pool and that is available to process outgoing messages without allocating new writers.

value.span: 用于对传出消息进行处理的最大编写器数。

span.span: The maximum number of writers available to process outgoing messages.

value.span: 默认值为 16 个各种类型的编写器。

span.span: The default is 16 writers of each type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增大此数字将会增加内存消耗，但能够让编码器处理传出消息的突现高峰，因为编码器可以使用池中已创建的编写器，而不必创建新的编写器。Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of outgoing messages because it is able to use writers from the pool that are already created instead of creating new ones.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks JSON 消息编码不支持 SOAP 与 WS-Addressing。The JSON message encoding does not support either SOAP or WS-Addressing. 含有 与 ，二者都分别指定了这种不支持。The contains and , which respectively specifies this non-support.

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints on SOAP messages that are exchanged.

value.span: 下面的备注部分中提供了这些约束的默认值。

span.span: The default values for these constraints are provided in the following Remarks section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些复杂性约束可以抵御某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表示这些约束的属性及其默认值（以字节表示）如下所示：The properties that express these constraints and their default values (in bytes) are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384
